overview: Vineet Jain is the CEO and a co-founder of Egnyte. Prior to Egnyte, Vineet co-founded Valdero, a supply chain software provider, where he managed engineering and operations. Previous to his time at Valdero, he was the vice president of engineering at a B2B direct materials marketplace. He also spent five years at KPMG Consulting, where he was a practice director of the supply chain practice. Vineet has 18 years of experience in the software industry, and his strengths include the operations management of early stage technology teams, business development, P&L responsibility and building customer-centric organizations.
